titleStmt.title: The best match, or, The believer's marriage with Christ a sermon on the parable of the marriage of the king's son, Mat. 22. 1, 2, &c. : preached at Potters Pury in Northamptonshire, September the 29th, 1690 / by Michael Harrison ... ; to which is added four hymns ...
titleStmt.author: Harrison, Michael, Minister at Potters-Pury.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
